Ukidz

About Us

UGEARS is the creator and manufacturer of unique self-propelled mechanical model kits designed for self-assembly without glue and made entirely of high-grade wooden material. The models are the original all-occasional gift, fun and smart hobby for kids and grownups of all ages. Made in Ukraine.

PIXIO – Magnetic construction set in the pixel art style. One PIXIO block is an ABS plastic cube 8 x 8 x 8 mm (0.3 x 0.3 x 0.3 inches) in size, weighing just over 1 gram (0.04 oz), and has 6 magnets inside. The design of the magnets and resulting polarity allows for the blocks to be connected to each other almost in any sequence from different sides (patent pending). Just take PIXIO blocks in your hands and bring them together – BANG! – the blocks are connected.


Our Story

Our story begins in 2016 when Ukidz was a single-brand distributor. Shortly after, we became the largest distributor of UGears Mechanical Models in the U.S. In a quest to reach a wider audience, 2020 led us to exciting partnerships! We expanded our brand offerings to include Pixio, Babai, Matador, Mozabrick, Unit Bricks and Once Kids. Our product lines are versatile and we strive to provide retailers, as well as consumers with unique, and high-quality specialty products from around the world. Ukidz is a dedicated team of professionals ready to provide unparalleled customer to service to all.
